meta.name: keyword
meta.content: wicket, web, j2ee, java, components, velocity, jakarta

section.name: Welcome to Velocity Panel
section.p: The Velocity Panel is a Wicket component that displays the result of rendering a Velocity template. The template itself can be any IStringResourceStream implementation, of which there are a number of convenient implementations in the wicket.util package. The model can be any normal Map, which will be used to create the VelocityContext.
The Velocity Panel is part of the Wicket Stuff project. This Wicket powered project provides non-core components to the Wicket project.

section.name: Latest News

subsection.name: March 22, 2005 - Wicket Stuff was accepted by SourceForge
subsection.p: The Wicket team wishes to thank the SourceForge team for accepting Wicket Stuff as a project on the SourceForge servers. This allows Wicket to grow further beyond our dreams.

section.p: See the news archive for more (older) news.

section.name: Special Thanks
section.p: The Wicket Stuff development team would like to thank the following partners for supporting Open Source in general and Wicket in particular.
